name: Motion Design
role: Some samples of my motion design work:

name: 3D SHOP - new design
role: The app is redesigned and currently it's during implementation
description: "This full stack app was created in order to make online shopping more user friendly. 3D models are more appealing for potential customers."

name: Noterat.io
role: In this project, I was mainly UX head and closely cooperating with a product owner and other developers.
description: "It's a user-friendly application that distributes and analyzes the available data on the Swedish Parliaments (Riksdag) API and website. The aim is to create an informative and neutral platform where the users can easily access and control specific documents and political activity without ending up in filter bubbles."

name: Office Finder
description: "This app is was conceived for the ones that would like to have comfortable place to work remotely from."

name: 3D SHOP
description: "This full stack app was created in order to make online shopping more user friendly. 3D models are more appealing for potential customers."

name: Travel Buddy
role: My role was to do all design of the app, implement most of the frontend features and be a director && 'actress' of our presentation movie :) you can check it out below.
description: "The app was created as final project in </salt> bootcamp. My colleagues and I did that project from scratch in 10 days. It was conceived for travelers that wish to find a buddy to travel with. They can either create trips and wait for people to join them, or search through other people's trips and join them in their adventures."

name: Quiz App
description: "Quiz that generates questions thanks to Trivia API. UI was created by using Material UI"

name: Web Prototype
description: "The website was designed to promote house projects. There is a configurator that automatically estimates costs of houses and shows the next available date of starting the construction"
